mapper.select: SELECT A.REG_MONTH_INQUIRY AS VISIT_MONTH, COUNT(A.ID) AS CNT FROM VISITOR_HISTORY A INNER JOIN ( SELECT ID FROM VISITOR_HISTORY WHERE VISIT_STORY_MEM_ID = #{memId} AND REG_YEAR_INQUIRY = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y') GROUP BY REG_DATE_INQUIRY, CLIENT_ID, VISIT_STORY_MEM_ID ) B ON B.ID = A.ID GROUP BY A.REG_MONTH_INQUIRY

SELECT A.REG_DATE_INQUIRY AS VISIT_DATE , COUNT(A.ID) AS CNT FROM VISITOR_HISTORY A INNER JOIN ( SELECT ID FROM VISITOR_HISTORY WHERE VISIT_STORY_MEM_ID = #{memId} AND REG_MONTH_INQUIRY = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y%m') GROUP BY REG_DATE_INQUIRY, CLIENT_ID, VISIT_STORY_MEM_ID ) B ON B.ID = A.ID GROUP BY REG_DATE_INQUIRY
SELECT 20450 AS ALL_CNT, 2 AS NAVER_CNT, 6 AS DAUM_CNT, 7 AS GOOGLE_CNT, 8 AS ZOOM_CNT, 4 AS YAHOO_CNT, 9 AS ETC_CNT FROM DUAL

SELECT ( SELECT COUNT(A.ID) FROM ( SELECT ID,REG_DATE_INQUIRY FROM VISITOR_HISTORY WHERE VISIT_STORY_MEM_ID = #{memId} AND REG_DATE_INQUIRY = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y%m%d') GROUP BY REG_DATE_INQUIRY, CLIENT_ID, VISIT_STORY_MEM_ID ) A ) AS TODAY_VISIT_CNT, ( SELECT COUNT(B.ID) FROM ( SELECT ID,REG_DATE_INQUIRY FROM VISITOR_HISTORY WHERE VISIT_STORY_MEM_ID = #{memId} AND REG_DATE_INQUIRY = date_format((DATE_ADD(now(), INTERVAL -1 DAY)),'%Y%m%d') GROUP BY REG_DATE_INQUIRY, CLIENT_ID, VISIT_STORY_MEM_ID ) B ) AS YESTERDAY_VISIT_CNT, ( SELECT COUNT(C.ID) FROM ( SELECT ID,REG_DATE_INQUIRY FROM VISITOR_HISTORY WHERE VISIT_STORY_MEM_ID = #{memId} GROUP BY REG_DATE_INQUIRY, CLIENT_ID, VISIT_STORY_MEM_ID ) C ) AS CUMULATIVE_VISIT_CNT, DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS VISIT_STATIS_CRITERIA FROM DUAL
